item.title: Deportation Drama ‘Nomad Shadow’ Unveils First Clip Ahead of Toronto World Premiere (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: The first clip from Eimi Imanishi’s directorial debut “Nomad Shadow” has been released as the film prepares for its world premiere at the 50th Toronto Film Festival. The drama follow
